newsitem.title: USA: GSE Systems revises '96 EPS down to $0.82.
newsitem.headline: GSE Systems revises '96 EPS down to $0.82.

text.p: GSE Systems Inc said Friday it has revised its earnings per share from $0.89 to $0.82 for 1996. The company said the revision is based on the completion of the year-end audit by Coopers & Lybrand.
The company also said that the resultant net income for 1996 was $4.14 million instead of $4.5 million.

The adjustment, said GSE, relates to advance work performed in the fourth quarter, prior to receipt of a signed contract, to meet a completion date later in 1997. The work was done because the target completion date was not delayed despite the delay in approval of this sole source contract.

Since the signed contract has not been received, the company said it has adjusted its previously reported, unaudited 1996 results. GSE said, however, it has a high degree of confidence that this contract will be signed in the very near term.
